text: April 2, 2018 / 6:01 PM / Updated 34 minutes ago UPDATE 3-West Indies in Pakistan 2018 Scoreboard Reuters Staff 3 Min Read Apr 2 (OPTA) - Scoreboard at close of play of 2nd twenty20 between Pakistan and West Indies on Monday at Karachi, Pakistan Pakistan win by 82 runs Pakistan 1st innings Fakhar Zaman c Denesh Ramdin b Rayad Emrit 6 Babar Azam Not Out 97 Hussain Talat c Jason Mohammed b Odean Smith 63 Asif Ali c Chadwick Walton b Kesrick Williams 14 Shoaib Malik Not Out 17 Extras 0b 2lb 0nb 0pen 6w 8 Total (20.0 overs) 205-3 Fall of Wickets : 1-11 Zaman, 2-130 Talat, 3-167 Ali Did Not Bat : Ahmed, Ashraf, Nawaz, Khan, Amir, Ali Bowling Ov Md Rn Wk Econ Ex Keemo Paul 4 0 34 0 8.50 1w Rayad Emrit 4 0 47 1 11.75 1w Samuel Badree 3 0 26 0 8.67 Kesrick Williams 4 0 43 1 10.75 Odean Smith 4 0 40 1 10.00 Rovman Powell 1 0 13 0 13.00 West Indies 1st innings Chadwick Walton b Shadab Khan 40 Andre Fletcher b Mohammad Nawaz 1 Marlon Samuels c Asif Ali b Shadab Khan 12 Jason Mohammed b Mohammad Amir 15 Denesh Ramdin c Hasan Ali b Hussain Talat 21 Rovman Powell c Babar Azam b Mohammad Amir 3 Keemo Paul c Faheem Ashraf b Mohammad Amir 17 Rayad Emrit Run Out Sarfraz Ahmed 1 Kesrick Williams b Hasan Ali 1 Odean Smith c Mohammad Nawaz b Hussain Talat 6 Samuel Badree Not Out 2 Extras 0b 3lb 0nb 0pen 1w 4 Total (19.2 overs) 123 all out Fall of Wickets : 1-11 Fletcher, 2-50 Walton, 3-57 Samuels, 4-92 Ramdin, 5-94 Mohammed, 6-107 Powell, 7-113 Paul, 8-114 Emrit, 9-115 Williams, 10-123 Smith Bowling Ov Md Rn Wk Econ Ex Mohammad Nawaz 4 0 19 1 4.75 Mohammad Amir 4 0 22 3 5.50 Hasan Ali 4 0 33 1 8.25 Shadab Khan 4 0 23 2 5.75 Faheem Ashraf 2 0 11 0 5.50 Hussain Talat 1.2 0 12 2 9.00 1w Umpire Shozab Raza Umpire Ahmed Shahab Video Ahsan Raza Match Referee David Boon
